labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to provide time awareness capabilities for LLMs and applications. It offers tools to retrieve current time, handle time conversions, calculate days in months, generate timestamps, and determine week-year information. This server primarily solves problems related to time management, timezone conversions, and timestamp generation, making it suitable for applications requiring precise temporal data handling.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Time & Calendar" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around time-related operations and calendar information. The secondary label "Daily Productivity" is included as time management is often a key aspect of productivity tools. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories sufficiently describe the server's functionality.

tools.name: current_time
tools.description: Get the current date and time.

format.description: The format of the time, default is empty string

timezone.description: The timezone of the time, IANA timezone name, e.g. Asia/Shanghai

tools.name: relative_time
tools.description: Get the relative time from now.

time.description: The time to get the relative time from now. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

tools.name: days_in_month
tools.description: Get the number of days in a month. If no date is provided, get the number of days in the current month.

date.description: The date to get the days in month. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

tools.name: get_timestamp
tools.description: Get the timestamp for the time.

time.description: The time to get the timestamp. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

sourceTimezone.description: The source timezone. IANA timezone name, e.g. Asia/Shanghai

targetTimezone.description: The target timezone. IANA timezone name, e.g. Europe/London

time.description: Date and time in 24-hour format. e.g. 2025-03-23 12:30:00

tools.name: get_week_year
tools.description: Get the week and isoWeek of the year.

date.description: The date to get the week and isoWeek of the year. e.g. 2025-03-23

server_info_crawled.name: Time MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @yokingma/time-mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Empower your LLMs with time awareness capabilities. Access current time, convert between timezones, and get timestamps effortlessly. Enhance your applications with precise time-related functionalities. usage: npx time-mcp

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@yokingma/time-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
